Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Filter bypass indicator activation. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 05/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
